comment: "Into the Void" stars Martin Short, Steve Martin and Tom Hanks. While the story has many turns and twists, the high video quality is off-putting. I give it two out of five stars.

comment: Dr. Victor Lee used to do his colonoscopies in the gastric room at Civic Hospital.I was at the pushing end. He kept his eye out for speed bumps. His wife told him to strip down as soon as he got home because he stunk of human waste. Backdrafts are a real problem. Gas leaks happen
